import React from 'react' import useInput from '../hooks/useInput' import axios from 'axios' const Login = () => { const handleSubmit = (e) => { axios .post("http://localhost:3001/api/",{name:usersName.value, name:usersName.value}) .then((res) => res.data) } const usersName = useInput() const usersPass = useInput() const usersEmail = useInput() return (
